general_advisory: Dry weather may prevail over Jagatsinghpur district for the next five days. The sky condition may remain clear to partly cloudy. Wind speed will be within 26-30 km/h. Daily temperatures are likely to be 33-34°C for maximum and 25-26°C for minimum.

advisory: Yellow stem borer management - Spray appropriate pesticide to manage stem borer infestation.
Blast Disease Management - Spray appropriate fungicide to manage blast disease.
Avoid weeding during flowering and fruiting stage.
After harvesting, cut tops above bulb and dry in well-ventilated room for storage.
For long-term storage, sun dry and reduce moisture content before storing.
Monitor Tobacco Caterpillar with pheromone traps.
Treat okra seeds with Imidacloprid before sowing to prevent whitefly infestation.

Spray appropriate pesticide for Early Shoot Borer infestation.
